WRITING.TITLE: TWRP now has an ONLINE STORE! Check it out!

WRITING.TEXT: I'm Canadian, but yes! Those are the ones!
Anything sandwiched is usually a hit. Also, whenever we make them subtly resemble the Simpsons donuts - regardless of how they taste - they sellout! :P

WRITING.TITLE: [Homemade] Some of the donuts I've made for my College's Coffee Shop

WRITING.TEXT: As of yet, our amazing mod /u/Condensor has been taking time out of his schedule to put these tabs together as they don't exist anywhere on the internet yet. He streams on twitch every so often to share the process of how he breaks down the song. You should check it out, he'll post updates for it when he's going live here! In the meantime, you may have to wait for someone/him to get around to making the transcript for this.
I don't blame you. Those TWRP guys are especially uncool.
Will we ever see some more concert/GG Live action in Canada? It was great seeing you all in Toronto!
Join us, friend /r/TWRP
[I really wish they could!](https://www.reddit.com/r/gamegrumps/comments/50iin1/hiya_meouch_from_twrp_here_lets_shoot_the_shit_ama/d74ghlt)

Nothing! It was fine.
I think they just decided they'd feel more comfortable doing meet and greets at conventions rather than at venues.

At this point, VIP isn't really worth it.
They've changed it since the Toronto show and won't be meeting fans to get pictures with them; now they just sit you at a Q A and give you a signed poster.
Just a heads up!
I think we're going to have to agree to disagree on that one! Everyone I talk to raves about Phobos. He's a cool dude.

I think Phobos gets plenty of love! They're all pretty equally admired.
I also know of a couple people who've had successful lessons from him. Those fans are around, maybe they're just quiet like him. :)
No, Lee's Palace is 19+
Good question! From the looks of the ticket vendor, no, but I'll try to get a straight answer from someone!

WRITING.TITLE: TWRP/NSP are playing @ The Fillmore Silver Spring, Silver Spring, MD! TICKETS GO ON SALE SEPTEMBER 9th! (10am EST)

WRITING.TEXT: You've got your hands full :P
[Get your tickets here!](http://roythomson.com/eventdetail/Generator)
It's going sooo well! What do you think you'll tackle next?
I'm feeling very attacked right now.
See ya there! :)
Haha, no problem. It's what I'm here for 8D
